<h3 id="X30389">X(30389) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: CIRCUMORTHIC AND SUBMEDIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(7*a^3-3*(b+c)*a^2-(7*b^2-6*b*c+7*c^2)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30389) = 3*X(1)+4*X(3) = 5*X(1)+2*X(40) = 4*X(1)+3*X(165) = X(1)-8*X(1385) = 11*X(1)-4*X(1482) = X(1)+6*X(3576) = 9*X(1)-2*X(7982) = 2*X(1)+5*X(7987) = 6*X(1)+X(7991) = 5*X(1)-12*X(10246) = 19*X(1)-12*X(10247) = 10*X(1)-3*X(11224) = 8*X(1)-X(11531) = 9*X(1)-16*X(15178) = 12*X(1)-5*X(16189) = 23*X(1)-9*X(16191) = 13*X(1)-6*X(16200) = 15*X(1)-8*X(24680) = 2*X(1)-9*X(30392) = 24*X(2)-17*X(30315)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(3090). X(30389) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30389) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {2,30315}, {4,25055}, {5,3653}, {9,23073}, {10,10303}, {20,551}, {21,30304}, {30,9624}, {104,28148}, {140,3655}, {145,10164}, {214,936}, {355,632}, {376,9589}, {392,15071}, {405,9851}, <p>
X(30389) = midpoint of X(1) and X(16192)<br>
X(30389) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (7989, 3624), (9588, 3523)<br>
X(30389) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 3, 7991), (1, 7280, 2093), (3612, 21842, 1), (7982, 15178, 1)<br>
</p>
